content.prompt: In lines 34-35, the speaker’s use of the words “cut” and “cutting” most clearly suggests a similarity between the

choices.label: clearing of land and the healing of a disease
action of a scalpel and the movement of a ship
fate of the pumpkins and the challenges faced by a hero
difficulty of surgery and the progress of the wheelbarrow

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Distinguish between the literal and figurative meanings of words and phrases.
